title: Launch Site
purpose: Marketing hero for product detail and social
prompt: Photorealistic hero: a modern laptop on a clean desk showing a 3-5 page website homepage in a browser, soft window light, shallow depth of field, warm neutral tones, brand-accent teal #06b6d4 on key UI elements, no faces, 3:2 aspect, output JPG 2400x1600 and WebP 1200x800.

title: Launch Site
prompt: Clean studio thumbnail: a small browser window mockup card on a light gray background with label 'Launch Site' and price tag, crisp lighting, subtle shadow, brand accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400.

title: Growth Site
purpose: Marketing hero emphasizing scale and analytics
prompt: Photorealistic hero: modern meeting table with laptop showing analytics dashboard and blog, tasteful composition, cool neutrals with teal accent #06b6d4 on graphs, shallow depth of field, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.
alt_text: Growth Site — scalable website with blog and CMS

title: Growth Site
prompt: Studio thumbnail: small mockup with multiple page thumbnails layered, label 'Growth Site', clean background, brand accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400.

title: Extra Page
purpose: Feature hero showing a single page design
prompt: Photorealistic hero: close-up of a single-page mockup on a tablet with a pen beside it, soft studio lighting, neutral background, accent #06b6d4 on CTA, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2000x1333 + WebP 1000x667.

title: Extra Page
prompt: Minimal thumbnail: single sheet mockup with '+1' badge, clean background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4.

title: Blog
prompt: Photorealistic hero: cozy desk with open laptop showing a blog CMS editor, a notebook, and a cup of coffee, warm tones, brand accent #06b6d4 on editor UI, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.
alt_text: Blog setup — MDX blog and CMS

title: Blog
prompt: Clean thumbnail: small article card with image placeholder and title line, neutral background, accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400.

title: File Uploads
prompt: Photorealistic hero: hand interacting with a web form file upload UI on a tablet, subtle motion blur, clean UI, brand accent #06b6d4 on upload button, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2000x1333 + WebP 1000x667.

title: File Uploads
prompt: Thumbnail: stylized file icon with small upload arrow on soft background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, accent #06b6d4.

title: Booking
purpose: Hero showing booking UI and calendar
prompt: Photorealistic hero: close-up of hands scheduling on a calendar UI on a laptop, natural window light, calendar cells with teal accent #06b6d4, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.

title: Booking
prompt: Thumbnail: small calendar card with a highlighted date, soft shadow, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4.

title: Payments
prompt: Photorealistic hero: close-up of a checkout card form on a laptop and a lock icon overlay, soft studio lighting, blue/teal accent #06b6d4 on the pay button, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.

title: Payments
prompt: Thumbnail: credit card or chip icon on soft neutral background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4, minimal styling.

title: CMS
prompt: Photorealistic hero: editor UI on screen with live preview and editable blocks, clean desk, soft natural light, accent #06b6d4 on UI elements, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.

title: CMS
prompt: Thumbnail: small editor card with a pencil icon, neutral background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4.

title: Automation Setup
prompt: Photorealistic hero: multi-monitor desk showing a workflow diagram and integrations (API boxes and arrows), cool tones with teal accent #06b6d4, cinematic lighting, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.

title: Automation Setup
prompt: Thumbnail: simple flowchart card with arrows and nodes, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4, minimal composition.

title: Managed AI
prompt: Photorealistic hero: modern operations dashboard on a large monitor with chatbots and analytics widgets, soft studio lighting, teal accent #06b6d4 on key UI elements, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800.
alt_text: Managed AI — AI agents and operations

title: Managed AI
prompt: Thumbnail: robot/agent icon with service label, neutral background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4.
